attributes.action: Introduce regular referendums so that the people can decide major laws/decisions
attributes.additional_details:
Many cantons in Switzerland are also allowing voting by the internet or even SMS.
http://direct-democracy.geschichte-schweiz.ch/
http://www.consoc.org.uk/other-content/about-us/discover-the-facts/electoral-process/
attributes.background:
Currently MP's are voted by first past the post method.This leads to a situation where parties like Green and Ukip have only 1 MP each for almost 5mn votes. It is time for major decisions/laws to be made by regular referendum's  similar to what happens in Switzerland.
This would increase democracy
